name: The Apprentices' Barracks
description:
You are in the barracks of the apprentice magic users.  Here and there,
a young apprentice sits engrossed in magical study, or practicing a feeble
cantrip.  Cots line the walls, and the room continues east.

exits.keywords: door oak~ 1 -1 2543 S #2545 A Hallway~    You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.  Flashes of light can be seen under the doorway to the north.

exits.description: A flash of blue light momentarily lights up the door's outline.
